Remember your pet, your way.

At Precious Creature, our focus is on providing compassionate and judgement-free pet aftercare, memorial, and preservation.

We strive to give comfort in the most trying time of pet companionship with our alternative and bespoke approach to caring for a deceased pet. We value and respect diverse approaches to memorializing a pet. No request is too unusual.

Our Mission

Precious Creature exists in order to provide compassionate and judgement-free pet aftercare, memorial, and master preservation for families.
